attributes.action: That the government will guarantee that the GP's will not charge for a letter.
attributes.additional_details: That the government will guarantee that the GP's will NOT charge for a letter if needed to travel abroad and will honour our freedom now and in future.
attributes.background: Because the government has said there will not pursue the vaccine passport for travel but if for example the other contries ask for a letter from our Gp's we will not fund any cost to us but the government will bear the cost of letters to travel now and in the future

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for GP charges such as letters.

You could start a petition calling for the provision of free proof of vaccination certificates, or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574479
